name: Zoho CRM MCP Server - Langflow Configuration
description: Configuration for the Zoho CRM MCP server built at src/zoho_crm_mcp/server.py

mcp_tools.name: get_module_data
mcp_tools.description: Fetch data from Zoho CRM modules (Leads, Accounts, Contacts, Deals)

mcp_tools.name: get_available_modules
mcp_tools.description: Get list of all available modules in Zoho CRM

mcp_tools.name: search_records
mcp_tools.description: Search for records in a specific module

mcp_tools.name: create_record
mcp_tools.description: Create a new record in a specific module

parameters.module_name: string (required) - Module to create record in

mcp_tools.name: update_record
mcp_tools.description: Update an existing record in a specific module

parameters.record_id: string (required) - ID of the record to update

mcp_tools.name: delete_record
mcp_tools.description: Delete a record from a specific module

parameters.record_id: string (required) - ID of the record to delete

mcp_tools.name: bulk_create_records
mcp_tools.description: Create multiple records in a specific module (max 100 per call)

parameters.module_name: string (required) - Module to create records in
parameters.records_data: array (required) - List of record data objects

mcp_tools.name: get_record_by_id
mcp_tools.description: Get a specific record by its ID

parameters.record_id: string (required) - ID of the record to retrieve

mcp_tools.name: set_refresh_token
mcp_tools.description: Manually set a long-lived refresh token for autonomous operation

mcp_tools.name: get_token_status
mcp_tools.description: Get the current status of OAuth tokens and authentication

mcp_tools.name: test_zoho_connection
mcp_tools.description: Test the connection to Zoho CRM API with current tokens

mcp_tools.name: get_users
mcp_tools.description: Get all users in the Zoho CRM organization

parameters.user_type: string (optional) - Type of users to fetch (AllUsers, ActiveUsers, DeactiveUsers, ConfirmedUsers)

mcp_tools.name: schedule_appointment
mcp_tools.description: Schedule an appointment/event for a lead in Zoho CRM

parameters.lead_id: string (required) - ID of the lead to schedule appointment for

mcp_tools.name: qualify_lead
mcp_tools.description: Update lead qualification status with scoring data

parameters.lead_id: string (required) - ID of the lead to qualify

mcp_tools.name: convert_lead
mcp_tools.description: Convert a qualified lead to Contact, Account, and Deal

parameters.lead_id: string (required) - ID of the lead to convert

mcp_tools.name: create_task
mcp_tools.description: Create a task in Zoho CRM for follow-up activities

mcp_tools.name: get_lead_activities
mcp_tools.description: Get all activities (tasks, events, calls) for a specific lead

parameters.lead_id: string (required) - ID of the lead to get activities for

validation.startup_check: Server validates ZOHO_CLIENT_ID and ZOHO_CLIENT_SECRET are present
validation.error_message: ERROR: Missing required Zoho credentials. Please ensure ZOHO_CLIENT_ID and ZOHO_CLIENT_SECRET are set in .env.local

server_reference: Actual MCP server implementation (not HTTP endpoints) - use MCP protocol communication
notes: Complete configuration matching all MCP tools available in the built Zoho CRM server
capabilities: Full CRUD operations on CRM modules
